articles.title: O'Donovan and McCarthy win gold for Ireland at European Rowing Championships - The42
articles.description: Silver in Varese for Irish women’s four of Emily Hegarty, Eimear Lambe, Aifric Keogh and Fiona Murtagh.
articles.content:
Updated 39 minutes ago
WORLD CHAMPIONS PAUL ODonovan and Fintan McCarthy added European honours to their collection with victory at the European Rowing Championships in Varese, Italy.

articles.title: GPs advised against administering AstraZeneca vaccine until Niac update - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Niac met last week after the European Medicines Agency found a possible link between the vaccine and rare blood clotting issues
articles.content: General practitioners in Ireland have been advised not to administer the AstraZeneca vaccine to very high-risk patients until an update is available from the National Immunisation Advisory Committee … [+2471 chars]

articles.title: Canon announces the CJ17ex6.2B – a 4K-capable BCTV lens with wide focal length range - Guardian
